definition: Pyongyang, capital of North Korea
surname Ping

sentences.english: This is the Juche Tower, in central Pyongyang.
sentences.chinese: 这是位于平壤市中央的九川塔。

sentences.english: The same day, Kim Jong Il also visited Pyongyang Dragon Food Factory.
sentences.chinese: 同一天，金正日还视察了平壤市龙城食品厂。
